# EZ011-241083 Highway Maintenance and Repair North Section Km 589 to Km 968

## Solicitation Overview

The Government of Canada is seeking qualified contractors to perform highway maintenance and repair services for the North Section of the Alaska Highway, spanning from Km 589 to Km 968. This procurement is a 3-year contract, anticipated to begin on June 1, 2025.

## Tender Details

| **Field** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | WS4269687423 |
| Amendment Number | 0 |
| Publication Date | November 24, 2023 |
| Tender Closing Date | December 12, 2023, at 14:00:00 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | June 1, 2025 |
| Expected Contract End Date | March 31, 2026 |
| Tender Status | Expired |
| UNSPSC Codes | 72141000 (Highway and road construction services), 81101510 (Highway engineering) |
| Trade Agreements | CFTA, Canada-UK TCA, CPFTA, Canada-Colombia FTA, WTO GPA, Canada-Panama FTA, CKFTA, CAFTA, NAFTA, CFTA, CETA |

## Contract Requirements

The successful bidder will be required to perform year-round and seasonal maintenance activities on the Alaska Highway North Section, including but not limited to:

* Highway surface maintenance
* Winter maintenance
* Drainage maintenance
* Other activities listed in the work specifications

## Contact Information

For inquiries related to this tender, please contact:

* Summer Wong (she/her)
* email: [summer.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:summer.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
